backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profile storage and task CRUD with authorization checks and task ownership enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping product features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing roles of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint with mobile-focused meta tags, theme color, and references to favicon and app icon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and routing into the main task UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileSca: Mobile-first layout with header, user menu, content area, and footer, including logout handling.
frontend/src/features/tasks/components/D: Confirmation dialog for deleting a task, showing loading state and invoking the delete mutation.
frontend/src/features/tasks/components/T: Form component for creating a new task with title and description, calling useCreateTask on submit.

frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and tasks through the actor API with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with additional utilities like custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Renders the main tasks screen with filters, sorting, task list, and a mobile-friendly task composer sheet.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, requirements, known issues, and image generation needs for the Pocket Tasks app.
